titleStmt.title: To the right honorable the Lords assembled in Parliament the humble petition of Sir John Gayer knight and alderman of London; sheweth, ...
titleStmt.author: Gayer, John, Sir, d. 1649.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first word of text.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill 19th. 1648 presented to ye Lords by himselfe but refused".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
